resources.string: Add your custom transaction which we missed to record
Allow us to take the SMS permission
Allow us to take the SMS and notification permission
We will access your SMS solely to detect transactions and notify you; your messages will not be used for any other purpose.
Import your CSV transaction files in the format: Amount, SpendOn, Date, Time.
Please do not close the app until we finish processing the data.
We require write permission to export the transactions.
No transaction found for selected option
The file has been successfully exported to the Downloads folder.
An error occurred while exporting the file. Please try again.
The CSV data is not in the correct format. Please verify it before importing.
Something unexpected happened while exporting. Please try again.
Something unexpected happened while processing SMS. Please try again.
Please enable the Write External Storage permission in the app settings.
No transactions found. While we monitor your transactions, you can manually add one using the button below.
